In other words, a colleague.\""},{"lineNumber":15044,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうも、総統閣下さん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Greetings, Supreme Commander.\""},{"lineNumber":15045,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう……ゼスにまだ俺の知らん美少女がいたとは。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh... so there’s still pretty girls in Zeth that I didn’t know about."},{"lineNumber":15046,"originalJapaneseLine":"　王国親衛隊ってのは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"The kingdom's royal guard is...\""},{"lineNumber":15047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「四天王の直属部隊って所かな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They’re probably the direct underlings of the Four Heavenly Kings."},{"lineNumber":15048,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本来は、俺たち四軍とは別系統なんだが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Originally, they belong to a different branch from our four armies..."},{"lineNumber":15049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦況が悪いから、って編入されたの」","translatedEnglishLine":"They were incorporated because the battle situation was bad."},{"lineNumber":15050,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……とまあそういうわけだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...So, that’s how it is."},{"lineNumber":15051,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本来はウルザの下で、","translatedEnglishLine":"Originally, she worked under Urza,"},{"lineNumber":15052,"originalJapaneseLine":"　捜査官みたいな仕事をしてたらしい」","translatedEnglishLine":"doing work similar to an investigator.\""},{"lineNumber":15053,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よしよし、ならば総統閣下と","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright then, Supreme Commander and I will have a war situation meeting in bed.\""},{"lineNumber":15054,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ベッドで戦況会議だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"A war situation meeting in bed."},{"lineNumber":15055,"originalJapaneseLine":"「却下。それより、ちょうどいいわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rejected. More importantly, just the right timing."},{"lineNumber":15056,"originalJapaneseLine":"　総統さんにはゼスやゼス国民に対する、","translatedEnglishLine":"Mr. Supreme Commander, there are various illegal acts alleged against you,"},{"lineNumber":15057,"originalJapaneseLine":"　様々な違法行為の容疑があるんだけど」","translatedEnglishLine":"committed against Zeth and its citizens.\""},{"lineNumber":15058,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぬ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":15059,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だいたいは暴行系なのだけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mostly assault-related charges, but,"},{"lineNumber":15060,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これをゼス法に照らし合わせると……」","translatedEnglishLine":"when these are examined under Zeth's laws...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なっ、なんだとーーーーーー！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What the hellーーーーーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時間が経つのは速いものさね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Time sure flies, doesn't it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが実感できたら、ランスも大人ってことよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once you truly feel that, Rance, it means you're an adult."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐ、ぐ、ぐぬぬぬ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "G-G-Grrr..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の断りもなしに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without even asking me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけでゆっくりお休み。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, take your time to rest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日の晩は若い子を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tomorrow night, with some young girls..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーーーーーーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahーーーーーーーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今更そんな我慢ができるかー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How can I possibly hold back now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、こら……っ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, hey...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここまで焦らされて黙ってられるか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After being teased this much, I can't stay silent!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やると言ったら断固としてやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I said I'm going to do it, then I definitely will!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「嫌ではないと言ってたな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You said you didn't hate it, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばっちりがっつりいくぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm going all in, full throttle!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、わかったわよ、わかったから、っ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-Okay, I get it, I get it, so...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、っ……も、もうっ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... geez... already...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ほんと……もう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Honestly... geez.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変わらない、んだから……っ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You really never change...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとキムチは夜明け近くまで、お互い楽しんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and Kimchi enjoyed themselves until nearly dawn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ソルトアン、参戦するわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Soltan, I will join the fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昼食は中庭にしようか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shall we have lunch in the courtyard?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あそこはいい風が通るしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The breeze there is really nice."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうね。この城の周りは風が爽やかだし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right. The air around this castle is fresh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の廊下で、サイアスが一人の少女と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the hallway of Rance Castle, Saias was walking with a young girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連れだって歩いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were walking together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何をイチャイチャと！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What are you two lovey-dovey for!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の城で口説いとるんじゃ貴様ーーー!！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flirting in my castle, you bastardーーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬で沸騰したランスが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, boiling with rage in an instant,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスを抜いて斬りかかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: drew Chaos and slashed forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バリア」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Barrier!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割って入った少女のバリアは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The young girl's barrier intervened,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの一撃を受け止め、弾き返した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stopped Rance's strike, and deflected it back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬ……君、やるではないか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... you're not bad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だがその男は顔だけのクズだぞ。やめた方がいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that guy is trash who only has a pretty face. You should stop."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいおい、あのなボーヤ……誤解だ誤解」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hey, kid... that's a misunderstanding, a misunderstanding."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちはソルトアン。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is Soltan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王国親衛隊からうちの炎軍に出向してる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was seconded from the kingdom's royal guard to our Blaze Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部隊長の一人だよ。つまり、仕事仲間だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and is one of the unit commanders. In other words, a colleague."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうも、総統閣下さん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Greetings, Supreme Commander."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう……ゼスにまだ俺の知らん美少女がいたとは。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh... so there’s still pretty girls in Zeth that I didn’t know about.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王国親衛隊ってのは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The kingdom's royal guard is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「四天王の直属部隊って所かな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They’re probably the direct underlings of the Four Heavenly Kings.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来は、俺たち四軍とは別系統なんだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally, they belong to a different branch from our four armies...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦況が悪いから、って編入されたの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were incorporated because the battle situation was bad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……とまあそういうわけだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...So, that’s how it is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来はウルザの下で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally, she worked under Urza,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捜査官みたいな仕事をしてたらしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: doing work similar to an investigator."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よしよし、ならば総統閣下と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright then, Supreme Commander and I will have a war situation meeting in bed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドで戦況会議だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A war situation meeting in bed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「却下。それより、ちょうどいいわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rejected. More importantly, just the right timing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統さんにはゼスやゼス国民に対する、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mr. Supreme Commander, there are various illegal acts alleged against you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 様々な違法行為の容疑があるんだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: committed against Zeth and its citizens."
"Hmm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だいたいは暴行系なのだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mostly assault-related charges, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これをゼス法に照らし合わせると……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when these are examined under Zeth's laws..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-What the hellーーーーーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「時間が経つのは速いものさね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Time sure flies, doesn't it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが実感できたら、ランスも大人ってことよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once you truly feel that, Rance, it means you're an adult."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐ、ぐ、ぐぬぬぬ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "G-G-Grrr..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の断りもなしに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without even asking me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけでゆっくりお休み。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, take your time to rest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明日の晩は若い子を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tomorrow night, with some young girls..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーーーーーーーー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahーーーーーーーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今更そんな我慢ができるかー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How can I possibly hold back now!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、こら……っ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, hey...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここまで焦らされて黙ってられるか！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "After being teased this much, I can't stay silent!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やると言ったら断固としてやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I said I'm going to do it, then I definitely will!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「嫌ではないと言ってたな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You said you didn't hate it, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばっちりがっつりいくぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm going all in, full throttle!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、わかったわよ、わかったから、っ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "O-Okay, I get it, I get it, so...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、っ……も、もうっ……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... geez... already...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ほんと……もう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Honestly... geez.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 変わらない、んだから……っ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You really never change...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとキムチは夜明け近くまで、お互い楽しんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and Kimchi enjoyed themselves until nearly dawn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ソルトアン、参戦するわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Soltan, I will join the fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「昼食は中庭にしようか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shall we have lunch in the courtyard?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あそこはいい風が通るしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The breeze there is really nice."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうね。この城の周りは風が爽やかだし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's right. The air around this castle is fresh."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城の廊下で、サイアスが一人の少女と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the hallway of Rance Castle, Saias was walking with a young girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連れだって歩いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were walking together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何をイチャイチャと！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What are you two lovey-dovey for!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の城で口説いとるんじゃ貴様ーーー!！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flirting in my castle, you bastardーーー!!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬で沸騰したランスが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, boiling with rage in an instant,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスを抜いて斬りかかる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: drew Chaos and slashed forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「バリア」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Barrier!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 割って入った少女のバリアは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The young girl's barrier intervened,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの一撃を受け止め、弾き返した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: stopped Rance's strike, and deflected it back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぬ……君、やるではないか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... you're not bad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だがその男は顔だけのクズだぞ。やめた方がいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that guy is trash who only has a pretty face. You should stop."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいおい、あのなボーヤ……誤解だ誤解」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hey, kid... that's a misunderstanding, a misunderstanding."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちはソルトアン。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is Soltan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王国親衛隊からうちの炎軍に出向してる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She was seconded from the kingdom's royal guard to our Blaze Army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部隊長の一人だよ。つまり、仕事仲間だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and is one of the unit commanders. In other words, a colleague."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうも、総統閣下さん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Greetings, Supreme Commander."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう……ゼスにまだ俺の知らん美少女がいたとは。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh... so there’s still pretty girls in Zeth that I didn’t know about.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王国親衛隊ってのは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The kingdom's royal guard is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「四天王の直属部隊って所かな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They’re probably the direct underlings of the Four Heavenly Kings.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来は、俺たち四軍とは別系統なんだが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally, they belong to a different branch from our four armies...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦況が悪いから、って編入されたの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were incorporated because the battle situation was bad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……とまあそういうわけだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...So, that’s how it is.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来はウルザの下で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally, she worked under Urza,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 捜査官みたいな仕事をしてたらしい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: doing work similar to an investigator."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よしよし、ならば総統閣下と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright then, Supreme Commander and I will have a war situation meeting in bed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドで戦況会議だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A war situation meeting in bed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「却下。それより、ちょうどいいわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rejected. More importantly, just the right timing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統さんにはゼスやゼス国民に対する、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mr. Supreme Commander, there are various illegal acts alleged against you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 様々な違法行為の容疑があるんだけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: committed against Zeth and its citizens."
"Hmm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だいたいは暴行系なのだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Mostly assault-related charges, but,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これをゼス法に照らし合わせると……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: when these are examined under Zeth's laws..."
